text: Brickellia nutanticeps is a Mexican species of flowering plant in the daisy family. It is native to central Mexico (Hidalgo, Veracruz, Puebla, México State, Morelos, Michoacán, Oaxaca).Turner, B. L. 1997. The Comps of Mexico: A systematic account of the family Asteraceae, vol. 1 – Eupatorieae. Phytologia Memoirs 11: i–iv, 1–272 ==References== * nutanticeps Category:Flora of Mexico Category:Plants described in 1818
title: Brickellia nutanticeps
